page.title: 16Ecology - Ecoleg.
page.content: Living as we are in a small rural village between the sea shore and the mountains we are lucky because there are so many varieties of birds living here. Many species are in danger because of man's greed and lack of respect for nature.Oil is the latest threat in this area.During the last two weeks local members of the Young Ornithologist Club have collected over 30 dead birds along Harlech beach.Many more have been affected by the oil spillage. Inland, birds too are affected by man's progress.Farmers who spray chemicals and use various poisons do interfere with the food chain.This results in some of the birds of prey especially, becoming rarer. Tackle left by anglers on river and lakesides affect the swans and geese.
